short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts email addresses from senders and email bodies on Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inbox Email Collector is a powerful chrome extension designed to help users efficiently capture email addresses from their Gmail inbox. Whether you are a marketer, recruiter, or simply someone looking to organize contacts, this extension simplifies the process by scanning both the sender information and the body of your emails to extract valuable addresses.

With an intuitive interface, using Inbox Email Collector is straightforward. Users need to log in to their Gmail accounts and activate the extension. Once opened, simply click the “Extract” button, and the tool will begin scanning through your inbox. Unlike many other tools, Inbox Email Collector is capable of scanning all pages of your Gmail inbox, ensuring you don’t miss any crucial contacts hidden beyond the first page.

After the extraction process is complete, all captured email addresses will be displayed within the extension for easy review. Users can quickly scroll through the list to verify the collected addresses. For added convenience, the extension includes a “SAVE” button, which allows users to export all extracted email addresses into a text file (.txt) for easy access and further use.

Inbox Email Collector is an invaluable tool for anyone looking to streamline their email management and improve contact organization. By simplifying the process of capturing email addresses, it saves users time and effort, making it a must-have extension for Gmail users.
